title.rendered: Training and Exchange of Best Practices for EIC Accelerator Short Application

content.rendered:
Prishtina REA is pleased to invite EEN advisors, related professionals, and potential applicants to participate in a specialized training on best practices for the EIC Accelerator Short Application. This training is designed to enhance the expertise of advisors working with deep tech companies that are potential candidates for the EIC Accelerator.

Day 1

26 September 2024 | 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM CET

Day 2

27 September 2024 | 9:00 AM - 2:30 PM CET

Trainer

Marie Moores

Format

Online Training

Please note: Participation is restricted to registered participants. The agenda and access link will be shared upon registration.

 Register Here :https://forms.gle/hCo6aAnWSEB36Nin8

We look forward to your participation in this insightful session aimed at refining your approach to the EIC Accelerator applications.
